ComicInfo.Summary:
Xula continues her tests and obstacles to prove her worthiness to Kaiju Queen. But will she accept her final challenge?
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including a pair of covers by series creator Dan Mendoza (DollFace)!!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Dan Mendoza | 1 | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 2 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marco Maccagni | 3 | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marco Maccagni | 4 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Trom | 5 | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Marcelo Trom | 6 |
